website_summaries.verdict: The Dell Chromebook 11 gets an Intel Core i3 processor for smoother performance and better multitasking, but it winds up being pricey for an otherwise basic Chromebook.
pros: Excellent performance, thanks to Intel Core i3 processor
Solid nine hours of battery life

website_summaries.verdict: While aimed at schools, the Dell Chromebook 11 can act as your primary online laptop at home as well.
pros: Haswell-based processor helps lengthen battery life
cons: Narrower screen angle than an In-Plane Switching (IPS) display

website_summaries.verdict: The affordable Dell Chromebook 11 Touch has a touch screen and a beefy, rugged design making it a good choice for classrooms.
cons: Low-resolution display with narrow viewing angles
Accuracy issues with touchpad in testing

customer_reviews.title: NOT A Dell 3120
customer_reviews.text: Upon reading another review dated Jan. 23rd, 2019, I discovered the fact that this is not a Dell 3120 but a Dell 3181. (See Photos Attached) I needed a 2.16 GHz processor and not a 1.6 GHz processor as this is. You can tell by the sloped section in front of the keyboard that this is in fact a slower 3181. Even the box and instructions state 3181. (see photos) I needed a faster speed for streaming movies, which this is not. Other people having difficulties connecting to their WIFI is due to the slower CPU speed. Totally False advertising trying to pass off a 3181 as a 3120. Sent back for a refund. Beware people !!!
customer_reviews.author: David256

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the best "small" Chromebooks in the market
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion and usage experience, this is one of the best "small" Chromebooks in the market. Too bad it tends to be marketed and sold as an educational - institutional market device rather than a general consumer product, because this is very good. It feels very well built, with rubber bumber rails around the edges, probably part of the mil spec it boasts about. This does not feel like a cheap notebook. Screen is bright and sharp, matt screen, respectable for a budget 1366x768 screen. Great battery life. Very nice keyboard feel to it. Performance is good, even for a Celeron processor.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Y.

customer_reviews.title: One of the laptops does not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these laptops. One of them works great. The other one started having glitches from the first time I powered it up. I called to try to return it and get a replacement and was told that I needed to try to troubleshoot the problem first. I was on the phone with three different people and spent 45 minutes trying this method. I was then put on hold for 15 minutes at which time I hung up. I reset the computer myself and that fixed the problem for about three uses and then it started glitching again. Very disappointed I could not get a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems quite solid and I am happy, especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems quite solid and I am happy, especially considering the price. One minor quibble (I imagine it may be a major quibble for some), is that the space key is "sticky", meaning it doesn't always respond unless I emphasize my tap when I type. Not a huge deal for me, but it has been a minor frustration at times. Still, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dasein

customer_reviews.title: but a little annoyed, expected better from a
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother who started college this year. It's very compact, small, and cute and works just as I'd expect from a chromebook. The only issue was that it crashed already a few times even though he did not have a lot of browsers on and the plastic part of the lens on the camera came off within a week. Definitely could work around it, as he said he wanted to keep it, but a little annoyed, expected better from a Dell
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent price, pretty beat up
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for distance learning. Didn't want to spend a lot as it was for a kid, but also needed durability. For $70 it works. Shipping was fairly fast, but surprised to see it sent in a laptop shaped box inside a bubble mailer. Not much for protection. The laptop holds a good charge and does the basics that is needed. However rating lower as the laptop itself is beat up. Deep scratches by the keyboard, and screen is scratched up. It works for our purpose, but if you're needing something a bit more professional, probably not your best option.
customer_reviews.author: Morika

customer_reviews.title: works fine for 3 months then dies
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk stopped working 3 months after purchasing. My son had hist first day of remote learning and it died halfway thru. Now we are scrambling to find something for tomorrow. Not cool Plus the screen had a dark mark on it that wouldnt come off
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer20000000

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and feel of the Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and feel of the Chromebook. Decent sized keyboard allows for comfortable typing. Clarity of the screen is excellent and it powers up very quickly. Still getting used to the new layout of the desktop but very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Philpot

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just not the same one shown!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop! Very small and portable. Only complaint and probably a pretty big one. The computer I received was not the same computer as advertised. The pictures and statements the seller claims to selling is a refurbished Dell Chromebook 3120, however, I received a refurbished Dell Chromebook 3180. The 3180 is a slightly superior machine and I’m completely satisfied with the product I received, but If you really want the superior durability the 3120 boasts, be aware that might not be the computer you will receive.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Junk , pass it by.
customer_reviews.text: I read the seller's description "moderate wear that does not affect its function" and I beg to disagree. I got a computer with a line burned a cross the screen and a display that's barely visible it's so dark. Waste of money. It's going back. Pass these junk books by...
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Screen Distortion at 90 days, unusable, not covered by warranty
customer_reviews.text: I'm beyond disappointed in this unit. My son used this for 3 months when we encountered serious screen distortion problems rendering this chromebook unusable. We had a decent experience mailing back to Dell for evaluation and repairs, but cost of repair is > cost of unit. $200 down the drain and only got 90 days out of this device.
customer_reviews.author: Sena Downes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price, but needed new screen.
customer_reviews.text: Device runs well once set up to my Wi-Fi at home. Keys all function well and chrome os is fast. The battery life at 100% charge said about 12 1/2 hours so good there. Only issue was scuffs on the screen and a small chip on the screen as well. I ordered a new screen whicb I can install myself, but for the price, I'd say this was a very good deal. Device shows low to moderate wear on the outside but nothing major, just a few scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Humphrey Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great computer.
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned the Acer C201 chromebook and loved that. But I love this one even more because the Intel Processor makes this more compatible with Ubuntu. The build is great, the ruggedness is great. The screen is more than adequate although maybe not the brightest. The computer feels quick for the needs I typically use it for. The keyboard and trackpad also work great although I typically use an external keyboard. My favorite part are the two 3.0 USB ports as well as the full size HDMI port plus the ruggedness of the laptop since it is built for education. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Great for older parents!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father and step mom who are technology challenged. I was terrified they would call every time they couldn't figure out how to use it (I live 9 hours away) they've never called!! It's perfect for someone who just wants to check email, occasionally shop online.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, could not be more impressed. Love that it has a shortcut to swap top row of keys back and forth to function keys. Pros: -battery lasts for-ever -boot and wifi connect are nearly instantaneous -clean, simple machine. Just works great -can't beat the price Cons: -Screen isn't beautiful but does the job -No backlight on keyboard (ugh) -Everything standard to a chromebook
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very good for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: It's convenient for Internet, receiving and sending e-mails. I also use it (with a flash drive and external amp) for playing music. A charge last 10 hours. It's inexpensive and light weight. The screen It's not good for editing WORD or EXCEL files.
customer_reviews.author: old man

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitively good for the price. I had to purchase a charging cable. The one that shipped with the laptop would not charge. The battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, maybe not as light as I would have ...
customer_reviews.text: It is small, sturdy, maybe not as light as I would have liked. But the great thing about it is that I can really work with this toy anywhere. I could never work with a tablet. The screen is excellent. It is matte, so it is not painful in the eyes. I can work with it outside in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Works fast. Used as a replacement for a dying iPad. The iPad was only used for surfing the web and email. So this was a cheaper replacement. It does everything we needed it to do. Printing was the only thing that took a little research. Luckily our printer was google cloud print capable so we were able to print also.
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for schoolwork
customer_reviews.text: Very happy customer...I bought these Chromebooks for my daughters as it is the same model they use at school. They are quick, easy to use and lightweight. The girls are overjoyed with there books and we have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: l.eves

customer_reviews.title: Decent little laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Well constructed machine. No frills but can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: For Surfing Internet You Can't Do Any Better
customer_reviews.text: Great for internet. Open lid and it is ready to go, loads instantly
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Laptop at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pre-teen daughter. It does everything she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lokin4Books

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little Chromebook. Durable, built solidly (better than the ASUS) and really quick on a charge and speed is fantastic with the Solid State Drive.
customer_reviews.author: shoobeedoobee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little computer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this computer so far! I love that it is made out of such durable material, and absolutely love the long battery life. It is easy to set up and use, and light enough that you can take it with you almost anywhere. This computer has been great to do school work on. I highly recommend this chromebook!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. Has waterproof keyboard and extra thick hinge for kids who carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: Marki Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 45 days after I bought it. Tried returning it and it's past the return date so I guess I bought a really nice paper weight. My guess is they didn't replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hood

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy screen
customer_reviews.text: My only issue was the screen bounces once in a while. But otherwise it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Zacher

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quicker than expected and was exactly what I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: AWhorton

customer_reviews.title: SKIPPED THIS PRODUCT! Short-lived laptop.
customer_reviews.text: it only lasted less than 6 months.. It just shut the monitor off while surfing and never boot-up since. Power led indication is ON.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY For the Price
customer_reviews.text: On time delivery. Great product. Works very well! Great sellers that are responsive and care about their customers
customer_reviews.author: raja chahal

customer_reviews.title: Not Great!
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying cheap Chromebooks. Guess you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Craig W.

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst Chromebook I've ever purchased. It died in less than 6 hours of use and now the replacement's keyboard 3,d,e,d,c keys abruptly stopped working. Avoid this Dell Chromebook at all cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Guyer

customer_reviews.title: It was great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month and the motherboard went out. Dealing with Dell support is a nightmare. Thankfully it is such a cheap chromebook I can just throw it out and buy something better
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. It’s cracked all over and missing keys. The screen is distorted and it shuts off as soon as you put it on. I am never buying from amazon again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: shanna bradley

customer_reviews.title: This seller does not keep his word concerning product .
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my computer with a dead battery. I had to go out and purchase a replacement battery before being able to use my computer. Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this laptop for my daughter and she loves it. For school and watching videos, music, etc. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Solid. In this day and age, we get crappy plastic containers and cheap hardware. This is awesome, no bloatware. Sturdy, easy to open. Battery life is more like 5 hours of active work. But everyone lies about their battery life.
customer_reviews.author: dizzy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is excellent for what I need! It's has very quick start up and zero updates! I highly recommend this laptop to anyone who needs a simple computer for studying or browsing the web!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately a bad purchase. Bought three. Didn't last three months.
customer_reviews.author: Errick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I use these for students. Decent size and weight. Semi-ruggedized. Spill-resistant keyboard. 10 hour real life battery. Just a great Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Alton

customer_reviews.title: Besides those two it works Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is not a touch screen or has no lights for the keyboard. Besides those two it works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee Schmeiser

customer_reviews.title: I love my chromebook
customer_reviews.text: The perfect combination of speed and portability. Great for on-the-go work, and the display is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Motl

customer_reviews.title: Screen breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I got this same model of Chromebook and within 2 months, the screen wouldn't work. And Dell isn't making it very easy to send it in for repair. Other than that it's a good machine with an Intel ARM processor that can handle much more than what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Winegrad

customer_reviews.title: great product, had to clean it up when arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Over all the product is good, The touch mouse is a little lose, but its great product, had to clean it up when arrived.
customer_reviews.author: raghu patel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chromebook. I compared with numerous other chromebooks and did not find any which stacked up, especially in the durability area. More than adequate for college or high school students. I would suggest adding an sd card for extra storage. While the keypad is not backlit this is easily remedied by adding a cheap usb light.
customer_reviews.author: SuperG1

customer_reviews.title: Good Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Great Chromebook, durable and fast. A little expensive but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Has great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable and my son loves it. Fits in his backpack and helps him get started on homework when still at school.Has great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Putney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Compact Device
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Dell 3120 Chromebook for my niece, who had one in high school and was looking for a laptop on a budget. It has been great so far. It has plenty of power for web browsing and Google's productivity suite is intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Tindall

customer_reviews.title: That you guys are grate thanks
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my son's school work and it's works great for us love it
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: I love this Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Chromebook. The only complaint is video quality when connecting to HDMI, but hey this was only a $200 Chromebook. Exceeds expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Tech buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best $200 spent on a computer. It's just a good and fast as a tablet but you actually have USB ports and it acts like a PC.
customer_reviews.author: Nghia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: battery last for a day and a half this is not a real laptop mainly use for schoolwork
customer_reviews.author: the truth 101

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works exactly as I need it to. This model definitely does not come with a Sim card slot.
customer_reviews.author: merc645

customer_reviews.title: my son is very happy with it as he uses it for school and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality and protective features. But what I think really doesn't matter; my son is very happy with it as he uses it for school and web related activity. He even dissed my old Dell PC by saying that the Chromebook blows the old PC away in terms of speed.
customer_reviews.author: No BS reviews

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Couple of things to get used to if you're new to Chrome OS but if you come from Chrome OS then I'd think it's all good. Very light software-wise so just what I wanted. Sturdy make.
customer_reviews.author: One Wizavu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs at least 4 GB RAM. It does not handle video well with only 2 gigs. Had to install adblock and change settings to only run plugins when I allow them to run to compensate for the RAM. It's pretty slow when surfing the net. Keeps losing connection to my printer forcing me to reboot the printer when I need to print a document. I find myself using Chrome Remote Desktop to print through my Workstation which is less than ideal. On the other hand it works fine for my kids school work. They have the 4 GB Chromebooks at school and they say that they are much faster than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: cuter than i thought
customer_reviews.text: got it early so that I could make sure it would be great as a Christmas gift. super, running and working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Podo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good battery life, fast shut down and start up times.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Has froze 7 times in the first week browsing Facebook and Reddit.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this Chromebook for about a week and it has already frozen 7 times while just browsing the internet. I did not expect a lot but this thing can't even browse Facebook with out freezing!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: I accidentaly wrote a negative report the other day since ...
customer_reviews.text: I accidentaly wrote a negative report the other day since I was missing a component. I received all. No problem. The owner was super-helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Zitter

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is great. I'm not a fan of the chromebook system, but the laptop works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best chromebook in its size
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer! Awesome battery life!! Only complaint was screen size was small
customer_reviews.author: donlonte themes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a good thing I did for myself, buying this handy little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: has a great battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is a very decent internet machine. Handles everything on Chrome, has a great battery life, rugged, lightweight and most importantly it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Atakan Yavuzkan

customer_reviews.title: Dell quality, you will fine buying this product. I like mine.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, in fact I am using it now. Pros: Looks like a real computer Made by Dell Feels like a quality laptop Lightweight Great battery life Very fast, instant boot time so you open it up and go right to the web Cons: My only wish for this would have been a back light for the keyboard. If you buy this I think you will like it. My laptop is a high end $1500 Alienware and I like this but just for checking gmail and websurfing. It does work with roboform if you use that.
customer_reviews.author: Thank you all

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great chromebook! Definitely rugged, but also lightning fast. Battery life is fantastic as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Tighe

customer_reviews.title: Great chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My family has 2 of them and they work absolutely wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Moore

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this in June and it died already
customer_reviews.author: susan reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with it. It is simple to operate and does what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: First off the shipping was quick, Within 5-6 days. My first day using it; I fell in love with the sleekness and look of the chromebook. Besides looks which isn't the biggest factor to an awesome notebook, it has really become useful for my school work. Being a first year college student everything I do is google docs, which is really a simple and effective method of getting work done. Only downside of the chromebook is the low storage and decent but not the best quality for watching videos or Netflix. Regardless, for school it definetly gets the job done and more.
customer_reviews.author: Julian G.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not that happy with this chromebook. It freezes often. You can do better google.
customer_reviews.author: Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product had no issues with it so far !
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids and learning websites
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Chromebook for more than a month. It does everything I thought it would. For the price, you really can't beat it. It has been incredibly helpful for my children to use in keeping up their skills over the summer. They spend time each day on the Khan Academy website and other learning sites. So far, all have worked great on the Chromebook. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ExperiencedPrimeShopper

customer_reviews.title: The Dell Chromebook with screenshader  is the best thing for older folks to use by far.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best chromebook I have ever owned. It has Dell features that can't be beat. My favorite is the "screenshader" which allows me to have a slight pink or orange cast instead of bright white which is really hard on my eyes. What a difference it has made. It is also the right size and not too heavy to have on my lap while I work from my easy chair. My grandchildren like doing their homework on it, and I feel comfortable with them using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and both the keyboard and touchpad are way better ...
customer_reviews.text: Chrome OS works as expected; fast and smooth. The Dell is light, sturdy and both the keyboard and touchpad are way better than expected. Battery life is a good 8 hours. Only minus is the screen, this isn't the best one out there.
customer_reviews.author: HCF

customer_reviews.title: Meet and exceeded all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving the Dell Chromebook! Got it for my grandson, whose in the 1st grade, to use in conjunction with his schools platform. He is thrilled with it. The Dell Chromebook meet and exceeded all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Truly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I actually give it a 4.8. The size, light weight, picture clarity and sound are great! I wish I had an 'end' and 'home' button, but I'm so slow to pick up on electronic features, there might be one and I haven't found it yet. lol The speed is incredible, way better than I had thought it would be! I highly recommend this chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: marditeach

customer_reviews.title: The first two that I bought were the cheapest models that I could find so when I bought my third one I paid a little more this t
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of the chromebook now for nearly three years. My only complaint is the first two that I bought stopped working in about a year. The first two that I bought were the cheapest models that I could find so when I bought my third one I paid a little more this time and bought the Dell hoping to get better build quality and longer service. The Dell feel more solidly built. The keypad has a better feel to it. So far so good. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Goff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chrome book and amazing battery life. Fast browser allows for quick results
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Langley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice - kids seem happy
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my kids for school. They seem really nice and the kids are happy with them. The only issue I have is that one of them had a button popped out of place when we opened it and now it won't stay on and my daughter has to constantly put it back on. Definitely an annoyance (and for $250 each, not the quality standards I would expect - especially from as reputable of a company as Dell). Other than that, the lay-flat screen and other features are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It is light weight and has great resolution. I think I may order one for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter. It is light weight and has great resolution. I think I may order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn Castillo

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old daughter uses it for school and fun. Synched nicely with her google school accounts
customer_reviews.text: Worked immediately, haven't had a problem since. 12 year old daughter uses it for school and fun. Synched nicely with her google school accounts. Works for all the games she plays. Fast wireless for gaming needs. Perfect purchase, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: This thing crashes all the time. Might crash when ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing crashes all the time. Might crash when I'm writing this. If it is an extension I am running in Chrome that is causing it to crash - it shouldn't - as I have the exact same extensions on my Samsung Chromebook (that never crashes)
customer_reviews.author: Carl M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Description did not say refurbished and was not aware it did not have a cd slot
customer_reviews.author: WILFRIED KURTA

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is sturdy enough for my two year old to drag it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is sturdy enough for my two year old to drag it around and not break it.
customer_reviews.author: consumer22

customer_reviews.title: works great !
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife and she loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Thelbert Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mouse area is so difficult to use. It makes scrolling an absolute pain that takes forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor this appears to be refurbished or used based on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received this computer today and it's pretty good. Just I don't know how to feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this computer today and it's pretty good. Just I don't know how to feel the fact the the carrier that shipped this to my house threw the box over the fence. It feels pretty solid and just right for what my son was looking for. I am testing the Chromebook right now and making this review for this computer. I will update my review the more my son uses it and tells me if it was worth the extra fifty dollars for a 4gb model. So far convinced that it should be a good computer overall.
customer_reviews.author: jose de jesus contreras

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a corrupted OS
customer_reviews.text: The chromebook arrived with a corrupted OS. (The second one!) Thankfully my son's biology professor is also a tech guy. He had to spend about two hours power washing the system, wiping it clean, resetting it back to factory setting, then uploaded the OS and then had to update the OS. It has been quite an odyssey. It is working now. And, on top of that, we thought this model was a touch screen. Nope. I hope these issues are not harbingers of things to come....wondering if I should just return it.
customer_reviews.author: avidereadercolorado

customer_reviews.title: Durable looking chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the computer yet. It is a gift. However, I took it out to charge it, and the product looks great and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: kimmerle79

customer_reviews.title: Didnt buy it for chrome os. i use linux.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop as a cheap alternative to use ubuntu and it was successful in that. The screen is ok for what you pay the battery life is fantastic and I mean fantastic. The keyboard is very comfortable for a laptops this size 11 inch. The 2 gigs of ram with the Intel Celeron chip same to run UbUbuntu very well no lags and issue SO FAR I have only have it frI'm Monday morning but from Monday I had Linux up and running I will be honest I didn't no even border to look at the chrome os. If you want a decent Linux laptop for a good price I recommend this I really do.
customer_reviews.author: deangelo bonimy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still getting use to using Chrome, but otherwise no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Not a great chromebook! Very Slow and the display is poor, but for the price and because it is a rugged protection it's better suited for a child. Save your money and get a tablet or better chrmebook.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is great and it is a great size.

customer_reviews.title: and it's a great machine overall
customer_reviews.text: OS update solved most issues, and it's a great machine overall, I just wish I've bought the model with 4GB RAM.

customer_reviews.title: not as user friendly as I would have liked, not a big fan of printing from the ...
customer_reviews.text: not as user friendly as I would have liked, not a big fan of printing from the cloud and such. Other wise is is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Limited capability
customer_reviews.text: Very limited compatability with university networks. Many university wireless network systems don't support the chrome book system. Chrome system also does not support many of the downloads needed to complete online tests (lockdown apps). If all you want to do is work with Google Docs it's great, but beware of its limited use if you expect it to function like a normal laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
